video_prompt: Futuristic gun swings, woman shifts gaze, denim jacket sleeves roll, high heels tap. Machine gears whir, pipes vent steam, panel lines subtly glow. Blueprints flicker, architectural designs emerge then fade.
image_prompt: Anime-style illustration of a young woman with wavy brown hair, wearing a crop top, denim shorts, and jacket, holding a futuristic blue and black rifle. She stands next to a large, detailed, blue and orange mechanical machine with exposed gears and pipes. The background is a white architectural blueprint. Bright, even lighting, clean lines, vibrant colors.
refined_video_prompt: Futuristic gun arcs, woman's gaze shifts. Denim jacket sleeves roll, high heels tap. Gears whir, pipes vent rhythmic steam. Panel lines subtly pulse with light. Blueprints flicker, designs emerge and fade.
